  From Wiki:
Joseph Hillstrom King, better known by the pen name Joe Hill, is an American author and comic book writer. He has published two novels Heart Shaped Box and Horns, and a collection of short stories entitled 20th Century Ghosts. He is also the author of the comic book series Locke & Key. 
Joe Hill\'s parents are authors Stephen and Tabitha King.
- - -
